input.sentences: the construction has started on refurbishing the old cottage .
we try to find bricks that match the original color .
then we replaced the rotting wood beams with new sturdy ones .
this should hold the roof fine .
we have a lot more work to do but it is a labor of love .
output.sentences: Today we started the refubishing of my family cottage.
We were able to match the color of the historic and original brickwork.
When we removed the old roof we found rotting wood, but a sturdy base to rebuild a new roof.
We replaced the upright beams to hold the roof structure and provide a fine roof on the cottage.
This project has been a lot of work for our family, but a labor of love.
